attributes.action: Give the public the right to call a general election and votes of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The British people should have a right to force an election if people in charge are destroying are country . Votes of no confidence should be put to the public not juat parliament
attributes.background: I want there to be a general election as soon as possible and for the Bristish people to be able to vote for a general election when they see fit also be able to have a general vote of no confidence in are pm who ever it may be

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311
